message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_WRONGTAG
message.locale: The tag %1s is not part of this address format and should not appear in the address details.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_TAGNOTFOUND
message.locale: Mandatory tag %1s does not appear in the address details.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_ADDRESS_LINE_FORMAT
message.locale: Address data line %1n is not in correct format.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_NO_NAME
message.locale: No name tag specified in address data line %1n.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_NOT_FREEFORM
message.locale: Attempt to map a non-freeform address as a freeform.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FREEFORM
message.locale: Attempt to map a freeform address as a non-freeform.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESSDATA_FV_NAME
message.locale: The %1s name tag already exists in the address map.
